Create a social media challenge that encourages people to share their own unfinished tasks and how they overcame them. #UnfinishedBusinessChallenge
Develop a mobile app that helps people prioritize and manage their unfinished tasks. #TaskMaster
Create a podcast that explores the psychology of unfinished tasks and how they affect our mental health. #UnfinishedBusinessPodcast
Host a workshop or seminar on how to overcome procrastination and complete unfinished tasks. #FinishWhatYouStarted
Develop a board game that simulates the experience of having unfinished tasks and the challenges of completing them. #UnfinishedBusinessGame
